00042       $xpath = (isset($_GET['xpath']) && $_GET['xpath'] != "") ? $_GET['xpath'] : "count(*)";
00043       $file = file_get_contents($_GET['rss']);
00044       if($dom_doc = domxml_open_mem($file)) {
00045         $xpathCon = $dom_doc->xpath_new_context();
00046         $namespace = $xpathCon->xpath_eval("namespace-uri(//*)");
00047         print "<p>Namespace: " . $namespace->value . "</p>\n";
00048         //xpath_register_ns($xpath, "rss", $namespace);
00049         $path_val = $xpathCon->xpath_eval($xpath);
00050         print_r($path_val->nodeset);
00051       } else {
00052         print "<p>Failed to open: " . $file . "</p>\n";
00053       }
